content.query:
SELECT
   MONTH(order_purchase_date) as ord_month,
   YEAR(order_purchase_date) as ord_year,
   COUNT(*) as No_of_orders
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsestore01.dfs.core.windows.net/synfiles01/syn_mod_1/orders.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY YEAR(order_purchase_date), MONTH(order_purchase_date)
ORDER BY 2,1
